nodes.text: Harch industrial adhesive was a type of adhesive associated with the sentient, spider-like Harch species. By 10 BBY, the pirate queen Maz Kanata listed it as one of the cargoes that offered the most profit per kilogram for smugglers in the book known as the Smuggler's Guide.
Harch industrial adhesive was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
